scripts.build:rollup: pulp build && rollup --config && npm run uglify:rollup
scripts.build:webpack: pulp build && webpack && npm run uglify:webpack
scripts.build:psc-bundle: pulp build --main Main --optimise --to dist/main-psc-bundle.js && npm run uglify:psc-bundle
scripts.build:pulp-browserify: pulp browserify --main Main --optimise --to dist/main-pulp-browserify.js && npm run uglify:pulp-browserify
